meta.title: Live the Life
meta.description: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn't take

quote.title: Smile1
lines: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.
